overview: In the midst of college application season, Ace struggles with the choice between going off to California to pursue her passion for photography at an art school or staying at home with her father in Atlanta after the recent death of her mother. Ace’s late mother’s memory remains a strong presence as she takes a surreal journey through the city to reconcile her future and her relationship with her father.
tagline: Faced with the memory of her late mother, an aspiring street photographer takes a surreal journey through the city as she reconciles her future and her relationship with her father.
title: Candid
